courses.name: Computer Programming
courses.description: Introduction to computer programming using Python. Covers basic syntax, data types, control structures, functions, and basic algorithms.

courses.name: Object-Oriented Programming
courses.description: Object-oriented programming concepts using Java. Covers classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and basic data structures.

courses.name: Mathematics I
courses.description: Basic calculus and algebra concepts including functions, limits, derivatives, and integrals.

courses.name: Mathematics II
courses.description: Advanced calculus topics including multiple integrals, series, and differential equations.

courses.name: Data Structures
courses.description: Implementation and analysis of fundamental data structures including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees.

courses.name: Algorithms
courses.description: Design and analysis of algorithms. Covers sorting, searching, graph algorithms, and algorithmic strategies.

courses.name: Database Systems
courses.description: Database design, SQL, normalization, and basic database management concepts.

courses.name: Operating Systems
courses.description: Operating system concepts including process management, memory management, and file systems.
